description:
Frustrated at having come out of his desert race with no more than a dusty old box, Gokudo pops it open and is instantly turned into an old man.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: E ni mo Kakenai Ryuuguujou ni Kite Mireba no Koto
Tienes que venir al palacio del rey Dragón.
When in the Unimaginable Ryuga Castle...
絵にも描けない龍宮城に来てみれば のこと
